agent_purpose: Analyze chat conversations for relationship insights, flags, and compatibility scores
description: Conversation analysis agent that performs vibe checks on chat conversations, identifying green and red flags with scored metrics

example_response.summary: This conversation reflects a promising and open rapport between both parties. There are notable signs of genuine effort, emotional availability, and balanced communication, making the foundation for a meaningful connection strong.

findings.title: Consistent Engagement
findings.description: Both participants respond promptly and ask thoughtful follow-up questions, showing investment in continuing the conversation.
findings.evidence: "I'm really looking forward to hearing how your presentation went! Let me know when you're free to chat."

findings.title: Emotional Sharing
findings.description: They openly share feelings about their day and express vulnerability, building intimacy.
findings.evidence: "I was a bit nervous about my meeting, but your encouragement helped me a lot."

findings.title: Shared Humor
findings.description: The use of light teasing and shared jokes helps ease tension and demonstrates compatibility.
findings.evidence: "If you keep cheering me on like this, I might win all my presentations!"

findings.title: Occasional Uncertainty
findings.description: There are brief moments where one person seeks reassurance, which is typical in early connections but worth noting.
findings.evidence: "Hope I'm not bothering you by texting during your busy hours!"

example_response.verdict: Sparks are flying and the emotional vibe is strong—keep the momentum going!
recommendations: Continue nurturing the open communication style.
Be mindful of reassurance needs to ensure both feel secure.
Find opportunities to deepen connection with shared activities or interests.
example_response.receipts: This duo shares open laughs, good vibes, and genuine support—definitely one to root for! Minor signs of insecurity are natural but overall, this relationship is off to a shining start.
